column4: how do I uninstall my nvidia drivers from my hard drive (hardy heron) using the live cd gutsy gibon
lost, you don't, the drivers are compiled against the running kernel. The ones in the live cd don't match (if that's what you're after)
boot into recovery mode, and run   dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
but tech0007 's way will work if you're comfortable editing system files
